key.name: path-left
key.summary: A path to the original folder
key.description: Folder that has been backed up and needs to be checked.

key.name: path-right
key.summary: A path to the backup folder
key.description: Backup folder that needs to be checked.

key.name: auto-update
key.summary: Determines whether the view should automatically update
key.description: Automatically update the view when a new folder is selected.

key.name: show-all
key.summary: Determines whether the view should show all files
key.description: If false, only files or folders that are not common to both directories will be shown. Only recommended to be used for testing purposes.

key.name: view-files
key.summary: Determines whether the file viewer should be open
key.description: If true, file changes will be shown in the sidebar whenever possible.

key.name: default-height
key.description: The height of the main window in pixels.

key.name: default-width
key.description: The width of the main window in pixels

key.name: is-maximized
key.summary: A flag to enable maximized mode
key.description: If “true”, the main window starts in maximized mode.

key.name: sidebar-width
key.summary: The width of the folder browser
key.description: Sets the width of the sidebar by altering the default position of the pane.
